get.description: This will show all the available clusters

in the Prometheus text format

List.description: List defines a slice of GTIDs

Mutex.description: A Mutex must not be copied after first use.
Mutex.title:
A Mutex is a mutual exclusion lock.
The zero value for a Mutex is an unlocked mutex.

cluster.description:
A Cluster has all the information associated with the configured cluster model
and its servers.

clusters.description: A Clusters is a collection of Cluster objects

status.description:
The Status contains string value for the alive status.
Possible values are: running, starting, errors
